title: CreatoriumGuy
author: CreatoriumGuy
content: http://creatorium.network/nft-fan-weekJoin us for four days of shmoozing and gaming at 8 Bit And Up Video Games in New York City.If you are going to be in town for  NYC NFT, stop in and have some fun.Network With NFT Enthusiasts8 Bit And Up is open from 3pm until 8pm. Stop in any day during the week to chat with NFT creators, collectors and buyers.Name That Pokemon ChallengeYou know you grew up with Pokemon. Come in and find out how much you know about them. Cool prize for the winner.Street Fighter ChallengeSo maybe Pokemon is not your thing.  But you probably spent time battling your friends in Street Fighter. Come in and play on classic arcades.  High scorer for the week wins a cool prize.June 20 - 23rd  3pm until 8pm8 Bit And Up Video Games86 East 3rd Street  (Near 1st Avenue)New York, NY  10003212 674 0201Take F Train to 2nd Avenue Station
